data.eml:eml: Annotated checklist and distribution of the Socotran Archipelago Herpetofauna (Reptilia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Razzetti, Edoardo, Sindaco, Roberto, Grieco, Cristina, Pella, Francesca, Ziliani, Ugo, Pupin, Fabio, Riservato, Elisa, Pellitteri-Rosa, Daniele, Butikofer, Luca, Suleiman, Ahmed Saeed, Al-Aseily, Badar Awadh (2011): Annotated checklist and distribution of the Socotran Archipelago Herpetofauna (Reptilia). Zootaxa 2826: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277271
